name: Technical Breach - First Notice
subject: Notice of Covenant Breach - {{series_name}} (ISIN: {{isin}})
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

This is with reference to the Trust Deed dated {{trust_deed_date}} executed between {{issuer_name}} ("Company") and Axis Trustee Services Limited ("Debenture Trustee") in connection with the above-mentioned Non-Convertible Debentures.

Based on our review of the quarterly financial results for {{testing_period}}, we have observed a breach of the following covenant:

Covenant: {{covenant_name}}
Trust Deed Reference: Section {{trust_deed_section}}
Required Threshold: {{comparison_display}} {{threshold}} {{unit}}
Actual Value: {{actual_value}} {{unit}}
Deviation: {{deviation_pct}}%

As per the terms of the Trust Deed, you are hereby notified that the above covenant has been breached. The Company is required to cure this breach within {{cure_period_days}} days from the date of this notice, i.e., by {{cure_deadline}}.

Please submit a remediation plan within 7 (seven) days from the date of this notice, outlining the steps the Company proposes to take to cure the breach.

Failure to cure the breach within the stipulated time may result in the Debenture Trustee taking appropriate action as per the terms of the Trust Deed.

We request your immediate attention to this matter.

Yours faithfully,
For Axis Trustee Services Limited

Authorized Signatory

name: Material Breach - First Notice
subject: URGENT: Notice of Material Covenant Breach - {{series_name}} (ISIN: {{isin}})
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

This is with reference to the Trust Deed dated {{trust_deed_date}} executed between {{issuer_name}} ("Company") and Axis Trustee Services Limited ("Debenture Trustee").

We write to bring to your URGENT attention a MATERIAL BREACH of covenant under the Trust Deed:

Covenant: {{covenant_name}}
Trust Deed Reference: Section {{trust_deed_section}}
Required Threshold: {{comparison_display}} {{threshold}} {{unit}}
Actual Value: {{actual_value}} {{unit}}
Deviation: {{deviation_pct}}%
Severity: MATERIAL BREACH

Given the material nature of this breach, we require:

1. An immediate response acknowledging receipt of this notice within 2 business days
2. A detailed remediation plan within 5 business days
3. A meeting with the management team to discuss the breach and remediation measures

The cure period as per the Trust Deed is {{cure_period_days}} days, expiring on {{cure_deadline}}.

Please note that continued breach may trigger the following consequences:
- Reporting to SEBI and stock exchanges
- Convening a meeting of debenture holders
- Potential enforcement of security
- Declaration of Event of Default

We await your immediate response.

Yours faithfully,
For Axis Trustee Services Limited

Authorized Signatory

name: Critical Breach - First Notice
subject: CRITICAL: Notice of Severe Covenant Breach - Immediate Action Required - {{series_name}}
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

REF: Trust Deed dated {{trust_deed_date}} - {{series_name}} (ISIN: {{isin}})

We write to notify you of a CRITICAL COVENANT BREACH that requires your IMMEDIATE attention and action:

Covenant: {{covenant_name}}
Trust Deed Reference: Section {{trust_deed_section}}
Required Threshold: {{comparison_display}} {{threshold}} {{unit}}
Actual Value: {{actual_value}} {{unit}}
Deviation: {{deviation_pct}}%
Severity: CRITICAL

Given the severity of this breach, we hereby:

1. DEMAND an immediate response within 24 hours of receipt of this notice
2. REQUIRE the Managing Director/CEO to personally acknowledge this breach
3. INSIST on a remediation plan within 3 business days
4. RESERVE the right to take immediate enforcement action

The cure period is {{cure_period_days}} days, expiring on {{cure_deadline}}. However, given the critical nature of the breach, we may initiate enforcement proceedings earlier if satisfactory progress is not demonstrated.

This notice is being copied to:
- Lead Arrangers
- Credit Rating Agencies
- Statutory Auditors

Immediate compliance is required.

Yours faithfully,
For Axis Trustee Services Limited
